sentences.en: The Pied piper had all the children of Hamlin on his heels.
sentences.cn: 穿彩衣的吹笛人使得汉姆林镇所有的孩子都跟着他走.

sentences.en: To contact the Bloomberg News staff on this story: Kevin Hamlin in Beijing on khamlin@bloomberg.net;
sentences.cn: 彭博新闻（Bloomberg News）本新闻联系人：凯文·哈姆林(Kevin Hamlin) （驻北京）khamlin@bloomberg.net。
